chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
e: DT this W A
i': state
i: state
k: cont A

Goal:
verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k

Premises:
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
vrf_coh : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
do_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> do_prog e \In has_spec this W s2
find_none = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v : V) (e : find k f = Some v) (e0 : f = upd k v (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some' _ _ _ _ _ x x0 x1 => _evar_...
do' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> DTbin this W s2
binarify = fun (A : Type) (p : pre) (q : cont A) => (p, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => p i -> q y m) : forall A : Type, pre -> cont A -> spec A Arguments binarify {A}%type_scope
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
dom_find_some' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) (v : V), find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true
conseq_refl : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) (e : DT this W A), conseq e (spec_of e)
dom_find_none' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
bind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> DT this W B
find_umfilt : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (p : pred K) (k : K) (f : U), find k (um_filter p f) = (if p k then find k f else None)
bind_s : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> spec B
inject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> DT this W A
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
DT_rec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Set), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rect : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Type), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_ind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Prop), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
rely_split : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely (inj_ext w) this s1' s2'
alw_act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
conseq : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid), DT this W A -> spec A -> Prop
